2.1.6. random_data¶

2.1.6.1. random_data¶

Synopsis:Generate random data of various types.
Created:2011-12-05
Author:DataONE (Dahl)

Functions

random_3_words() Return 3 random words separated by a random separator
random_bool()
random_bytes(n_bytes) Return a string containing random bytes
random_email()
random_unicode_char() Return a random Unicode character (from a limited set)
random_unicode_char_no_whitespace() Return a random Unicode character (from a limited set, no whitespace)
random_unicode_name() Return a random Unicode name
random_unicode_name_list(n_names) Return a list of random Unicode names. Names may be repeated
random_unicode_name_unique_list(n_names) Return a list of random Unicode names. Names are unique
random_unicode_string_no_whitespace([...])
random_word()
random_word_list(n_words) Return a list of random words.
random_word_unique_list(n_names) Return a list of random words.
